original_title: Strapped for Danger II: Undercover Vice
overview: The streakquel without equal! Two "straight" police detectives must go DEEP undercover to bust up a gay porn studio that is blackmailing Republican senators! If you enjoyed the naughty antics of Strapped for Danger, you're going to love Strapped for Danger II : Undercover Vice!
title: Strapped for Danger II: Undercover Vice
